name: server
description: - App workflow   - 1 route to communicate with frontend for every feedback submission   - Backend will save feedback in DB and send email to the owner of the app the uses the feedback widget - Initial setup   - TS   - ts-node-dev - Prisma setup - Route for feeback - Email Service - SOLID Principles   - Single Responsability Principle   - Liskov Substitution Principle   - Dependency Inversion Principle - Using SOLID in the application - Setting up jest - Unit tests in the application
